net.aksingh.owmjapis.util

Class ConversionTools

  • net.aksingh.owmjapis.util.ConversionTools

  • public class ConversionTools

    Provides methods for conversions, like converting windData direction from degree to direction code or name.

    • Method Detail

      • convertDegree2DirectionCode

        public static java.lang.String convertDegree2DirectionCode(double degree)

        Converts degree to direction code.

        Parameters:
        degree - Degree of windData (as received from OpenWeatherMap.org).
        Returns:
        Direction code, e.g., "N", "NE", etc.
        Throws:
        - Degree should be between 0 and 360.

      • convertDegree2DirectionName

        public static java.lang.String convertDegree2DirectionName(double degree)

        Converts degree to direction name.

        Parameters:
        degree - Degree of windData (as received from OpenWeatherMap.org).
        Returns:
        Direction name, e.g., "North", "North East", etc.
        Throws:
        - Degree should be between 0 and 360.
